channel.title: [Pi] Help [Rep++]
channel.description: Hey guys, so whenever someone dies in castle wars, it really kills them, they lose their items and everything, they respawn to the respawn point too, how do I fix that? Also, when your in castle wars, it thinks your in the wild, it has the skull in the bottom right corner and thinks your in the wild, can anybody help me with this? I will Rep you and I will be very appreciative. Thanks guys!

item.title: [Pi] Help [Rep++]
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

You would just have to add a check that they are not in castle wars when they are in wild. Should be something like

if(c.inWild()) { //code }

You should alter it to

if (c.inWild() && !c.inCastleWars()) { //code }

This is not the right code, you have to alter it to match your server code.

Read full topic

item.title: [Pi] Help [Rep++]
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

You can fix this in your giveLife method in playerAssistant and in client.java process.

The interfaces will be handled in process and where you go when you die, ect is in giveLife
